means: 惯性滑行的，随心所欲的
轻快地行动，凭惯性前进( freewheel的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He has given up his freewheeling lifestyle to settle down with his baby daughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他放弃了自由放纵的生活方式，和幼小的女儿安顿下来。

sentence.Network_en: On the descents, cyclists spin past cars, freewheeling downhill at tremendous speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在坡道上，自行车手飞驰着超越了一辆辆汽车，靠着惯性一路疾冲下山。

sentence.Network_en: An advertising agency or a freewheeling startup might be a better fit.
sentence.Network_cn: 对这样的人来说,广告公司或者自由工作者会更为适合.

entry.tran: 随心所欲的;自由放纵的
entry.def: If you refer to someone's freewheeling lifestyle or attitudes, you mean that they behave in a casual, relaxed way without feeling restricted by rules or accepted ways of doing things.

example.ex: He has given up his freewheeling lifestyle to settle down with his baby daughter.
example.tran: 他放弃了自由放纵的生活方式，和幼小的女儿安顿下来。

example.ex: ...an update on corporate affairs delivered in Johnson's unique, freewheeling style.
example.tran: 约翰逊以他独特的、随意漫谈的方式对公司事务所作的最新情况介绍

sentences.sentence: "the versatility of his poetic freewheeling style"
